name: Xbox Wireless Controller
generalVariants: Various color and special edition variants
colorOptions: Robot White, Carbon Black, Shock Blue, Pulse Red
Various special editions and custom designs
batteryType: 2 × AA batteries or rechargeable battery pack
regionDifferences: Some color variants may be region-specific
supportOnPC: Full native support on Windows, Steam support
designNotes: Refined the successful Xbox One controller design with subtle improvements including a new D-pad, textured grips, and reduced latency.
history: Developed alongside Xbox Series X/S consoles, focusing on backward compatibility and cross-generational support.
reception: Praised for its refinements over the Xbox One controller, particularly the improved D-pad and build quality.
legacy: Continues Microsoft's controller design philosophy while adding modern improvements and maintaining broad compatibility.
technicalChallenges: Maintaining backward compatibility across multiple Xbox generations
Balancing new features with familiar design
Ensuring consistent performance across different connection methods
descriptionShort: Microsoft's latest Xbox controller with improved D-pad, textured grips, and Share button.
descriptionLong: The Xbox Wireless Controller is Microsoft's controller for Xbox Series X/S, featuring an improved hybrid D-pad, textured grips, reduced latency, and a new Share button while maintaining compatibility with previous Xbox consoles.
